description.en: adds December to the next year (all winter months together). in the result every year starts at Dec-01. and ends Nov-30; generates num variable 'Year_adjusted' to show change; generates chr variable 'season' to allow grouping the data based on season.

input_data.title: Input table (result from point_att_polygon)
input_data.description: dataset with columns for Year and Month (all the rest variables stays the same)

date_col_name.title: date_col_name
date_col_name.description: Column name to Date in format YYYY-MM-DD; Year, Month, Day, Year_adj - will be generated. Example: visit date.

group_to_periods.title: group_to_periods
group_to_periods.description: Example: Dec-01:Mar-01,Mar-02:May-30,Jun-01:Aug-30,Sep-01:Nov-30. TODO must ask astra what this is

group_labels.title: group_labels
group_labels.description: Example: winter,spring,summer,autumn. TODO must ask astra what this is

year_starts_at_Dec1.title: year_starts_at_Dec1
year_starts_at_Dec1.description: year_starts_at_Dec1. TODO must ask astra what this is

peri_conv.title: peri_conv result table
peri_conv.description: TODO must ask astra what this is
